signature-algorithm.help: The algorithm used for digital signing. 0 = RSA, 1 = EC256

rsa-signature-length.help: If RSA is used for signature algorithm, this specifies the length. Valid values are 2048 or 3072

use-mbed-tls.help: Use Mbed TLS as the crypto library backend (default)

use-tinycrypt.help: Use tinycrypt as the crypto library backend

overwrite-only.help: The default is to support A/B image swapping with rollback. A simpler code path, which only supports overwriting the existing image with the update image, is also available.

overwrite-only-fast.help: Uncomment to only erase and overwrite those primary slot sectors needed to install the new image, rather than the entire image slot.

validate-primary-slot.help: Always check the signature of the image in the primary slot before booting, even if no upgrade was performed. This is recommended if the boot time penalty is acceptable

max-img-sectors.help: Maximum number of flash sectors per image slot

scratch-size.help: Size of scratch area in bytes. Must be sector-aligned.

bootloader-build.help: If building the bootloader, set to 1 (default). If building as a library (for use by an application) set to 0
